title: Learn to swim. - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: Robert Steele, New Line Cinema, New Zealand. Dept. of Education and Ronald Bowie
brief_description: Presented in 3 parts. Part 1 deals with the gaining of confidence and getting used to being in water. Part 2 focuses on general excersises such as foot and leg action whereas part 3 deals entirely with arm action.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Steele, New Line Cinema, New Zealand. Dept. of Education and Ronald Bowie
